trans-unit.source: Represents a displacement in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] space.
A <xref:System.Windows.Point> represents a fixed position, but a Vector represents a direction and a magnitude (for example, velocity or acceleration).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Point>는 있지만 (예를 들어 개발 속도 또는 가속) 크기와 방향 벡터 나타내는 고정된 된 위치를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Point>

trans-unit.source: Thus, the endpoints of a line segment are points but their difference is a vector; that is, the direction and length of that line segment.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 선 세그먼트의 끝점은 포인트 있지만 차이가 vector 해당 즉, 방향 및 길이 선 세그먼트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In XAML, the delimiter between the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> values of a Vector can be either a comma or a space.
trans-unit.target: Xaml에서는 사이의 구분 기호는 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>쉼표 또는 공백이 된 벡터의 값이 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character.
trans-unit.target: 일부 문화권 소수점 구분 기호로 마침표 대신로 쉼표 문자를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 고정 문화권에 대 한 처리 하는 XAML 대부분 XAML 프로세서 구현에서 EN-US로 기본값을 소수 구분 기호로 마침표 속해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a Vector in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a Vector attribute value into the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> components.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하지 않아야 쉼표 문자 소수점 구분 XAML에서 벡터를 지정 하는 경우에 벡터 특성 값의 문자열 형식 변환 충돌 됩니다 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A>구성 요소.</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or- ``` ## XAML Values *x* The vector's X component.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` -or- ``` # # XAML 값 *x* 벡터의 X 구성 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> property.
*y* The vector's Y component.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure.
The <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X*>-offset of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*>-offset of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
Translates the specified point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 점이 지정된 된 벡터에서 변환 하 고 결과 포인트를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The amount to translate the specified point.
The point to translate.
The result of translating point by vector.
Adds two vectors and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 두 벡터를 추가 하 고 결과 <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first vector to add.
The second vector to add.
The sum of vector1 and vector2.
Retrieves the angle, expressed in degrees, between the two specified vectors.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 두 벡터 사이의 각도도 단위로 각도 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The angle, in degrees, between vector1 and vector2.
trans-unit.target: 각도도 단위로 사이의 vector1 및 vector2 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the cross product of two vectors.
The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The cross product of vector1 and vector2.
The following formula is used to calculate the cross product: `(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)`
trans-unit.target: 다음 수식은 외적을 계산에 사용 됩니다.`(Vector1.X * Vector2.Y) - (Vector1.Y * Vector2.X)`

trans-unit.source: Calculates the determinant of two vectors.
The first vector to evaluate.
The second vector to evaluate.
The determinant of vector1 and vector2.
Divides the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the result as a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 스칼라로 지정된 된 벡터를 나누고 결과 <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to divide.
The amount by which `vector` is divided.
The result of dividing vector by scalar.

Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is a <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref> structure and, if it is, whether it has the same <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*> values as this vector.
trans-unit.target: 결정 하는지 여부를 지정 된 <xref:System.Object>는 <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref> 구조 및 인 경우이 든 동일 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 값이이 벡터 형식입니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.

Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 <xref:System.Double>산술 연산을 수행 하는, 두 개를 비교 하는 경우 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Vector>은 논리적으로 동일한 구조를 실패할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Vector> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The vector to compare.
if o is a and has the same and values as this vector; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 o 는 동일한 <> *> 및 <> *> 값이 벡터로; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares two vectors for equality.
A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.

Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Windows.Vector> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 <xref:System.Double>산술 연산을 수행 하는, 두 개를 비교 하는 경우 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Windows.Vector>은 논리적으로 동일한 구조를 실패할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Vector> </xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The vector to compare with this vector.
if value has the same and values as this vector; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 value 같은 <> *> 및 <> *> 값이 벡터로; 그렇지 않으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares the two specified vectors for equality.
trans-unit.target: 같음에 대 한 지정 된 두 벡터를 비교합니다.

trans-unit.source: A vector's <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y%2A> properties are described using <xref:System.Double> values.

Because the value of a <xref:System.Double> can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two <xref:System.Double> structures that are logically equal might fail.
trans-unit.target: 때문에 값을 <xref:System.Double>산술 연산을 수행 하는, 두 개를 비교 하는 경우 정밀도 떨어질 수 <xref:System.Double>은 논리적으로 동일한 구조를 실패할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Double>

The second vector to compare.
if t he and components of vector1 and vector2 are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if t he <>*> and <>*> components of vector1 and vector2 are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this vector.
trans-unit.target: 이 벡터에 대 한 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스에 대 한 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of this vector.
The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as the magnitude.
The length of this vector.
Gets the square of the length of this vector.
The length of a vector is sometimes referred to as its magnitude.
The square of the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length*> of this vector.
Multiplies the specified scalar by the specified vector and returns the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 반환 하 고 지정된 된 벡터에 지정 된 스칼라를 곱합니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The scalar to multiply.
The vector to multiply.
The result of multiplying scalar and vector.
Multiplies the specified vector by the specified scalar and returns the resulting <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그 결과 반환 하 고 지정된 된 벡터와 지정 된 스칼라를 곱합니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The vector to multiply.
The scalar to multiply.
The result of multiplying vector and scalar.
Transforms the coordinate space of the specified vector using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된를 사용 하 여 지정된 된 벡터의 좌표 공간을 변환 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The vector structure to transform.
The transformation to apply to `vector`.
The result of transforming vector by matrix.
Calculates the dot product of the two specified vectors and returns the result as a <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 두 벡터의 내적을 계산 하 고에 <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> 으로 결과 반환

trans-unit.source: The first vector to multiply.
The second vector structure to multiply.
A containing the scalar dot product of vector1 and vector2, which is calculated using the following formula: `(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)`
trans-unit.target: A 의 스칼라 내적 포함 된 vector1 및 vector2 , 다음 수식을 사용 하 여 계산 되는: `(vector1.X * vector2.X) + (vector1.Y * vector2.Y)`

trans-unit.source: Negates this vector.
The vector has the same magnitude as before, but its direction is now opposite.
trans-unit.target: 벡터 크기는 전과 동일한 갖지만 방향을 반대가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Normalizes this vector.
A normalized vector maintains its direction but its <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A> becomes 1.
trans-unit.target: 정규화 된 벡터는 방향은 그대로 유지 되지만 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>는 1.</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting vector is often called a unit vector.
trans-unit.target: 결과 벡터 단위 벡터를 이라고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A vector is normalized by dividing the vector by its own <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 로 고유 벡터 <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Vector.Length%2A> 분할 하 여 벡터

trans-unit.source: Translates a point by the specified vector and returns the resulting point.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 벡터에 따라 점을 변환 하 고 결과 포인트를 반환 합니다.

The point to translate.
The result of translating point by vector.

The vector to subtract from `vector1`.
The difference between vector1 and vector2.

The string specifying the format to use.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_IFormatProvider" name="IFormatProvider" href=""> </xref> 값의 서식을 지정 하는 데 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -또는- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 운영 체제의 현재 로캘 설정에서 숫자 형식 정보를 가져올 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 형식에서 현재 인스턴스의 값을 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific formatting information.
A string that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Vector.X*> and <xref:System.Windows.Vector.Y*> values of this <xref href="System.Windows.Vector"></xref>.
Gets or sets the X component of this vector.
trans-unit.target: 이 벡터의 X 구성 요소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The X component of this vector.
The default value is 0.

trans-unit.target: 이 벡터의 Y 구성 요소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Y component of this vector.
The default value is 0.
